protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the ATP-dependent amination of UTP to CTP with either L-glutamine or ammonia as the source of nitrogen.

pathway.name: CTP biosynthesis via de novo pathway

go_class.description: nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
nucleobase, nucleoside and nucleotide metabolic process

reference.reference_text: Yamauchi M, Yamauchi N, Meuth M: Molecular cloning of the human CTP synthetase gene by functional complementation with purified human metaphase chromosomes. EMBO J. 1990 Jul;9(7):2095-9.
